channel.title: Softlayer_network_lbaas_l7healthmonitor on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_network_lbaas_l7healthmonitor on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7HealthMonitor
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7HealthMonitor Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_LBaaS_L7HealthMonitor type presents a structure containing attributes of a health monitor object associated with a L7 pool instance. Note that the relationship between backend (L7 pool) and health monitor is 1-to-1, pools object associated with a health monitor must have the same pair of protocol and port. Example: frontend FA: http, 80 - backend BA: http, 3456 - healthmonitor HM_http3456 frontend FB: https, 443 - backend BB: http, 3456 - healthmonitor HM_http3456
